hero.title: Cyrus Programming Language
hero.subtitle: A programming language designed for simplicity, performance, and developer happiness.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Cyrus Lang combines the best aspects of modern programming languages with innovative features designed for today's development challenges.

cleanSyntax.title: Clean and Readable Syntax
cleanSyntax.description: Designed with readability in mind, Cyrus Lang's syntax is intuitive and reduces cognitive load.

typeSystem.title: Strong Type System
typeSystem.description: Catch errors at compile time with a powerful type system that provides safety without verbosity.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-platform Compatibility
crossPlatform.description: Write once, run anywhere. Cyrus Lang works seamlessly across all major operating systems.

concurrency.title: Built-in Concurrency
concurrency.description: First-class support for concurrent and parallel programming with intuitive primitives.

standardLibrary.title: Extensive Standard Library
standardLibrary.description: A rich, well-documented standard library that covers most common programming needs.

openSource.title: Open-source & Community-driven
openSource.description: Developed in the open with contributions from developers around the world.

examples.title: Elegant by Design
examples.subtitle: Cyrus's syntax is designed to be intuitive, expressive, and easy to read.

why.title: Ancient Wisdom, Modern Power
why.paragraph1: Cyrus blends timeless principles of engineering with state-of-the-art compiler technology. It's built to empower developers with a language that is both intuitive and powerful.
why.paragraph2: In a world crowded with programming languages, Cyrus stands apart by offering a unique balance of simplicity and strength. Designed for developers who care deeply about both productivity and performance, Cyrus Lang eliminates the need to compromise. Its clean, expressive syntax lowers the barrier to entry, while its advanced compiler infrastructure ensures your programs run with uncompromising speed.
why.paragraph3: Unlike traditional languages that force a trade-off between rapid development and runtime efficiency, Cyrus delivers both. Whether you're prototyping a new idea or engineering a high-performance system, Cyrus gives you the confidence that your code will remain elegant, fast, and maintainable. With first-class support for modern programming paradigms, built-in safety features, and a focus on developer experience, Cyrus Lang is your companion for building everything from simple scripts to complex, large-scale software systems.

getStarted.title: Get Started with Cyrus Programming Language
getStarted.subtitle: Start building with Cyrus in minutes. It's easy to install and comes with comprehensive documentation.

code.description: Start writing your first Cyrus Lang program.

getStarted.availability: Available on Windows, macOS, and Linux

Footer.description: A modern programming language designed for simplicity, performance, and developer happiness.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.welcome: Welcome to the official documentation for Cyrus. Here you'll find everything you need to get started with our modern, expressive, and efficient programming language.

errorAlert.title: Under Development
errorAlert.content: Consider that Cyrus is under heavy development and is not stable yet. Therefore, it is not recommended for production environments or critical applications where stability and long-term support are paramount. Users should anticipate frequent updates, breaking changes, and potential bugs as the project evolves.

newcomers.title: For Newcomers
newcomers.description: If you're new to Cyrus, start with our comprehensive tutorial to learn the basics and get up to speed quickly.

reference.title: Language Reference
reference.description: For a detailed overview of Cyrus's built-in types, functions, and modules, check out our language reference.
